4.caption_en:
A three-layered infographic shows concentric “radar” user diagrams connected by lines to a boxed platform hub, depicting flow from individual user views down into an integrated platform with stakeholder components.

{"artifact":{"layout":"vertical flow (top-to-bottom)","top_layer":"concentric radial diagram with segmented outer ring, highlighted sector, inner rings and central user silhouette","middle_layer":"concentric radial diagram with multiple small node circles around inner rings, directional arrow markers on outer ring, and central user silhouette","bottom_layer":"rectangular boxed unit containing a central circular 'Platform' hub surrounded by four smaller circular stakeholder nodes with distinct icons","connections":"thin white lines linking centers of the top and middle radial diagrams to the corners/edges of the boxed platform, indicating data or relationship flow","color_palette":{"background":"dark slate blue/teal-gray","rings":"light gray and white","highlights":"medium gray and teal outline for box","icons":"white and dark gray"},"shapes":["circles","rings","arrows","lines","rectangle (box)"],"icons":["user silhouette (center)","group/people","bar chart","link/chain","individual user"],"labels":["'Platform' text in central hub"],"purpose":"visual representation of user-centric data or interactions funneling into a central platform and associated stakeholder elements","style":"flat, schematic infographic with minimalist icons and muted grayscale tones"} }
